reviewText: love all the national geographic DVD I get
Not quite as good as the very best documentaries, but close enough. The narration/soundtrack could be a bit classier, and there should be a blu-ray version.

Saw it on TV recently and was very impressed by the footage and commentary (I collect nature videos) - the cameras get very close and personal (ex. one is apparently on an eagle) and the commentary is very deep/interesting (ex. this is the 20th generation of arctic fox to use this burrow:).  My 7 year old son who has trouble sitting thru most nature videos asks to watch this one.
